uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.editors.mail

Class MultipartMailBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.editors.mail.TextMailBuilder
      • uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.editors.mail.MultipartMailBuilder

  • public class MultipartMailBuilder
extends TextMailBuilder
    class to build a set of mime parts incrementally Text parts are merged until explicitly flushed or a non text part is added. The autoFlush option can be used to make separate calls act like flushText.
    Author:
    spb
